title: How to plan a train trip
en: Plan your train: use PTV Journey Planner for next services and platform info.

title: How to touch on at the station
en: At the station gates: touch on with myki to enter.

title: How to wait on the platform
en: On the platform: wait behind the yellow line and watch screens for your train.

title: How to board the train
en: When train arrives: let passengers off first

title: Train seating and etiquette
en: Find a seat or hold the rail; keep bags off spare seats.

title: How to get off the train
en: At your stop: alight carefully and follow the exit signs.

title: How to touch off at the exit
en: Exit gates: touch off with myki to finish your trip.

title: Printable train guide
en: Official PDFs (multi-language) for printing: how to travel by train in Victoria.
